  • Help

    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Ammo
    Class used to create Ammo items' variables, fields, and specify their behavior under certain circumstances
    AttackResult
    Class used to figure out, which attack the enemy had used
    Bandage
    Class used to implement the item Bandage, which is used for healing
    Batteries
    Class used to implement the item Batteries and it's behavior and use
    Cassette
    Class used to create and implement item Cassette's behavior, it's use and values
    CeleryStealthSystem
    Class used to implement the stealth system in the celery, which is required to complete in order to finish the game
    Character
    Class used to implement and specify Characters' fields, values, behavior
    CombatSystem
    Class used to implement the combat system of the game
    Command
    Interface used to implement all the commands player can use
    CommandException
    Class used to create exception CommandException, used for commands, helps in debugging
    CommandFactory
    Class used to create the commands map, which is later used to call commands
    CommandFactory.CommandCreator
    Helping interface used to create a player-requested command, throws special Command exception(helps in debugging)
    DropCommand
    Class used to implement and specify the behavior of the Drop command(Used to drop items from player's inventory)
    Enemy
    Class used to create and implement the enemies' behavior, values and methods
    EquipCommand
     
    ExamineCommand
    Class used to create and implement examine Command's behavior
    ExitCommand
    Class used to implement the exit command, which exits the game
    Flashlight
    Class used to implement the item Flashlight and its behavior, value,etc.
    Game
    Class used to store the game main logic and important methods
    GameState
    Class used to store and save the game's data, which we later use when loading the game(Serialization)
    GameStateTest
    Test class for verifying the serialization/deserialization functionality of GameState.
    GearLock
    Class used to implement the Lock located in the Celery(Player has to insert all 4 GearPieces to proceed)
    GearPiece
    Class used to create and implement the GearPiece item, its values and fields
    HealingItem
    Class used to implement the healing items in the game
    HealingSerum
    Class for the implementation of a HealingItem HealingSerum
    HelpCommand
    Class used to implement the Help command(Prints out all available commands player can use)
    Hint
    Class used for implementing the Hint item type
    InsertCommand
    Class used to implement the insert Command, which is used for inserting Gear pieces into a mechanism
    Inventory
    Class used for the implementation of inventory
    InventoryCommand
    Class used to implement the Inventory command(Upon use, the items in player's inventory will be printed out)
    Item
    Class used to implement items, their values, fields and use
    KeyItem
    Class used to implement items, which fall under the category of 'key items'
    Knife
    Class used to implement the weapon 'Knife'
    Lock
    Method used to implement the Locks in the game, their fields, behavior and values
    Main
    Main class, used to start the game
    MoveCommand
    Class used to implement the Move command, allowing player to move to adjacent/neighbor rooms
    Pistol
    Class used to implement the Pistol weapon
    PistolAmmo
    Class used to implement the item PistolAmmo
    Player
    Class used to implement the user/player, his fields, values and behavior, choices
    PlayerTest
    Test class for verifying the functionality of the Player class.
    RepairTool
    Class used to implement the item Repair Tool
    Room
    Class used to implement rooms' behavior, values, fields and their methods
    RoomTest
    Test class for verifying the functionality of the Room class.
    SaveManager
    Class used to manage save files
    SearchCommand
    Class used to implement the search command
    SearchSpot
    Class used to implement the search spot, its values and fields
    Shotgun
    Class used to implement the weapon Shotgun
    ShotgunShells
    Class used to implement the ammo type and item ShotgunShells
    Stalker
    Class used to implement the enemy Stalker
    StalkerFinalBattle
    Class used to implement the StalkerFinalBattle enemy(final boss)
    TakeCommand
    Class used to implement the Take command(used to pick up items in rooms, in which the player had dropped them)
    UseCommand
    Class used to implement the Use command(for items)
    Weapon
    Class used to implement Weapon items, their values, fields, usage
    World
    Class used to implement the world, its layout, methods, fields, behavior, etc.
    WorldTest
    Test class for World functionality.
    Zombie
    Class used to implement the Zombie enemy
